title: Scottish Golf Looks to the Future with New Board Appointments (Scottish Golf Union Limited)
text: ( Source : Scottish Golf Union Limited ) 16, October 2015 Scottish Golf , the new governing body for the sport in Scotland , has unveiled its new Board of Directors , with the appointment of an exciting new leadership team boasting wide-ranging
